alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 12:52PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allen, east central Wells, northern Adams and western Van Wert Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1251 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Bluffton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monroe around 1255 PM EDT. Decatur around 100 PM EDT. Monroeville around 110 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
